activities: Human resources data from Masco Corporation's EU subsidiaries is transferred to Masco in the United States ("Masco USA").  Such data is transferred to Masco USA for processing and storage for the general purpose of conducting human resource administration and in connection with our ethics hotline.  Examples of the specific purposes for which Masco USA collects and uses human resources data from Masco's EU subsidiaries include, without limitation, measurement performance and evaluation, workforce management and training, succession planning, compensation and benefit determination, business contact directory, running of IT infrastructure, storage and hosting of data, network management, internal communication, business administration, internal social media sharing, global supply chain E-sourcing and other supply chain operations and compliance with certain legal obligations.
